website_summaries.verdict: This masterfully crafted platform truck offers a great mix of affordability and quality.
pros: Aluminum construction ensures it will serve you well for an extended period of time
Offers a load capacity of 600 pounds
Boasts two rubber casters and two rolling wheels for amazing maneuverability
Designed to help you navigate tight corners and narrow hallways

customer_reviews.title: 4 stars because of the noisy cart UPDATED
customer_reviews.text: It is noisy and squeaks allot, it works well for my job delivering boxes of printer paper, the wheels move well and it seems to be holding up to the job. Update: The two front wheels fell apart. I have never put more than 400lbs on the cart and Friday the non turning wheels fell apart.
customer_reviews.author: Oakleaf

customer_reviews.title: The only cart that could handle what I needed
customer_reviews.text: In my long search for a cart that was both the right dimensions and weight capacity to handle my double oven, I came across this cart here on Amazon and I'm very thankful. It is the perfect size and strength for me to roll around this big 300 pound oven, so I can plug it in to different places around the shop.
customer_reviews.author: Greg T.

customer_reviews.title: Wanted To Love It, But....
customer_reviews.text: I'm not sure this is a fair review of the product because on receipt of the product I could tell the packaging was absolutely not suitable to the weight of the product and sure enough big dent in the side. I guess one could learn to live with dents and scratches but I believe the manufacturer should use packaging to have the product arrive safely. The packaging contains absolutely zero protection between the outside walls of the carton and the aluminum frame. Therefore, if you're willing to accept dents and scratches this still might work out for you but I'm not interested in receiving a new product that looks like it's been used many times.
customer_reviews.author: Pet Lover

customer_reviews.title: Perfect Size
customer_reviews.text: I own a business in an art community where we share a platform truck. After finding once again that someone had stashed it in their studio so no one else could use it I broke down and bought my own. This fits perfectly and easily through a doorway. It is long enough to hold three large totes at one so I can make fewer trips to my car when heading to a craft show. It is sturdy enough to hold my product - those totes are filled to the brim with soap and glass jars. The handle folding down I can easily stash it away and it is light enough for me to lift and move by myself if needed.
customer_reviews.author: Raven's Edge

customer_reviews.title: sturdiness of product and how easy it is to fold handle up and down made ...
customer_reviews.text: I debated on buying a much cheaper folding flat bed cart, but decided to go with this one instead since it was more heavy duty. Overall, I could not be more please. It had a few scratches when arrived, but the simple assembly (just have to put on wheels), sturdiness of product and how easy it is to fold handle up and down made it well worth additional cost. I use it at vendor shows and can't imagine not having it.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Built Solid, Large Platform, Good Value
customer_reviews.text: We bought one of these about a month ago and found it so useful around the shop we just bought another. Assembly is easy, just bolt the wheels to the platform. The platform truck is very solid and strong and rolls incredibly easy. The large platform is great for the large boxes that we receive on a daily basis. The handle folds down easily, but we never store these away since we use them daily.
customer_reviews.author: T Goeltz

customer_reviews.title: Satisfied so far.
customer_reviews.text: I bought this cart to carry drums in and out of schools. It replaced a larger, older cart that weighed 80 lbs and had a removable handle. The foldable handle works well consistently and makes for easy packing into the van. It is light weight and well constructed. I have had no problem moving 6 congas at a time or a complete sound system with 4 speakers. I'm curious as to how long the wheels will last and if the folding mechanism will handle some wear and tear, but so far I'm very satisfied with this purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Josh Dunigan

customer_reviews.title: I like the cart itself
customer_reviews.text: I like the cart itself. Its a perfect size but a little heavier than I expected. Also, it is shipped with the wheels off which is fine however, you have to remove all the bolts from the bottom to attach the wheels and they were on there tight. I had to really put some muscle into removing them.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Fancier version of similar carts . heavy duty use. perfect to keep one in garage. !
customer_reviews.text: Slightly heavy then smaller carts easy assemble just bolt on four wheels supplied and you are done. this is regular commercial size cart. nice well designed. came in dented at the top. better packing would be nice. other then that no issues so far. it does take up larger space so if you are looking for daily errand type of us try smaller size. Excellent item.
customer_reviews.author: ALEX

customer_reviews.title: Worth every penny
customer_reviews.text: I'm moving into a house with a long hallway. This thing is a life saver. Or at least a back/legs saver. I put a small doorway carpet on it for padding. With all the moving I've done for family and friends, I should have got this years ago. Solidly built. Worth every penny.
customer_reviews.author: Karl

customer_reviews.title: Works well for moving in and out of a van.
customer_reviews.text: Very light duty. A few hundred pounds maximum. Dents easily. Very light to pick up and store or carry up stairs. Fits well and is easy to put in a work van. Would highly recommend for light duty weight used periodically where storage is a priority. May not hold up to daily use or heavier weight.
customer_reviews.author: David P. Folsom

customer_reviews.title: Great, sturdy cart.
customer_reviews.text: I got this for my vending business and it is excellent. Strong, yet very lightweight. It has no problem carting around 8-10 cases of sodas. It went together in a couple of minutes and I am pleased.
customer_reviews.author: David C.

customer_reviews.title: so they are well pleased.
customer_reviews.text: I ordered this to transport our "stuff" when we go out selling tickets for our annual function and have to transport a tent, table, chairs, raffle drum, and our display pop ups. I have not personally used it but the feedback is it works really well. It is large enough and strong enough to transport all this stuff, so they are well pleased.
customer_reviews.author: Just me

customer_reviews.title: Works perfectly for my needs
customer_reviews.text: This is light weight and works well for me to move my plastic containers for my crafts easily out of the way. If I had to pick on anything.... it would be that one set of wheels moves sideways, but one set is fixed... would be slightly move maneuverable if both sets also moved sideways.
customer_reviews.author: Linda Brown

customer_reviews.title: Excellent Customer Service & Product
customer_reviews.text: I ordered the Aluminum Platform Truck and it was delivered in two days. Unfortunately, the bed of the truck had a pretty decent dent on the top. I reached out the the company and heard back from them immediately. They were more than gracious in helping to rectify the problem! I did a good bit of research before purchasing this particular truck and it did not disappoint! The truck itself is a great quality and exactly as described! Definitely recommend!
customer_reviews.author: Sarah

customer_reviews.title: Highly recommend this product for home or office use. ❤️💙❤️⭐️🇺🇸
customer_reviews.text: Very excellent quality, very well put together, our use this cart when I go to the big box stores and buy food in bulk and water. I can unload my trunk in one step and it’s easy to use, rides Smoothly, love the product. It can easily be stored out of the way. The quality of the metal is excellent.
customer_reviews.author: Micallef

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful flatbed!
customer_reviews.text: This is so beautiful you can't help but know it will perform exceptionally...and it does! Easy turns, holds many pounds and folds for easy storage in a fairly limited space...mine fits under a workbench. Perfect for every home.
customer_reviews.author: Joanne Cottis

customer_reviews.title: You get what you pay for
customer_reviews.text: Had one of those <$100 carts that were steel. Worked ok but it was a little short for what we needed.. This one weight about half of the previous one and is long enough for our needs. It seems to be better built. Happy with it and can recommend it.
customer_reviews.author: T. Mayer

customer_reviews.title: Great
customer_reviews.text: Great build. Solid and durable. Used mostly to haul large audio speakers and equipment. Make sure to place the wheels correctly. It comes with 2 swivel and 2 fixed don't mix them up like i did or else you'll have to take them off and reinstall them.
customer_reviews.author: Moses L. Feinga

customer_reviews.title: Sturdy and lightweight
customer_reviews.text: Trick aluminum rolling cart. I use it to move all my music equipment in and out of performance venues. Sturdy and lightweight. One guy can lift it in and out of a truck bed. You use your foot to hit the bar and the handle folds down. Very nice piece.
customer_reviews.author: Chance

customer_reviews.title: this cart could be improved on by giving the user ...
customer_reviews.text: this cart could be improved on by giving the user the option of having the rear wheels rotate 360degrees so when in tight corners maneuvering it with a load would be helpful.
customer_reviews.author: anthony solazzo

customer_reviews.title: Compact, value for home use. Inadequate packaging for shipment.
customer_reviews.text: Light weight for strength. Folds for efficient storage. Good value for home, occasional use. Packaging for shipment was inadequate. Cosmetic damage (small dents) resulted. Didn’t affect utility.
customer_reviews.author: Paul G.

customer_reviews.title: You will love this cart!
customer_reviews.text: I love this cart! Everything is just right with it! The handle height, the wheels roll so easy! It is so light I never thought it would haul the loads I put on it! Pushing it is so easy. It goes right where you want it to go. I would recommend this cart to anyone who needs that extra help carrying packages. I bought mine for home use and love it you will too!
customer_reviews.author: Helen   R.

customer_reviews.title: Built like a tank!
customer_reviews.text: This is a great push cart. As an entertainer, it easily moves my musical equipment and is very well built and has strong features. You will not be sorry!
customer_reviews.author: G. Magno

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Works fantastic for the warehouse. Just placed an order for two more.
customer_reviews.author: SFSharWix

customer_reviews.title: this is a great cart. Very sturdy and easy to assemble
customer_reviews.text: this is a great cart. Very sturdy and easy to assemble. I have used it for trade shows and it is not only a time saver but a life saver. folds up to be flat and fits perfectly in my trunk. Holds a lot of weight. Only thing I wish it had was locking wheels. it wants to roll away when your loading it. other then that its awesome!
customer_reviews.author: Theodore Bottone

customer_reviews.title: Nice combination of size and weight.
customer_reviews.text: Works perfectly. I didn't see an instruction sheet, so it took a little while to find the right size wrench to install the wheels. With the swivel wheels on the front it is easy to drive. It was a great help in hauling boxes to set up a display. Worked fine on sidewalk, tile floor and carpeted floor.
customer_reviews.author: M. Thornton

customer_reviews.title: Just Right
customer_reviews.text: This product is well sized for moving boxes, not too big, not too small. For it's very sturdy construction, it is also relatively lightweight. I anticipate getting several years of service from this product.
customer_reviews.author: Muad'Dib

customer_reviews.title: Light weight and easy to use
customer_reviews.text: The platform truck is great! I use it as both a dolly for moving heavy items, and as a wagon to haul several stacked boxes of product at once. It is light weight and easy to fold, so fits well in my truck with my merchandise. Please note that is pulls better than it pushes when loaded. Thanks!!
customer_reviews.author: April Meneley

customer_reviews.title: Does the Job!
customer_reviews.text: This cart is great! I got it to put a record player and stereo speakers on. I wanted to be able to roll the whole system in and out of the closet easily, and this was just the thing! Would be nice if the cart was more narrow, but the length is just right. Very lightweight, easy enough to maneuver (especially for being so large with just heavy cargo). It is true to size, straightforward to assemble, and folds easily.
customer_reviews.author: Libby

customer_reviews.title: nice cart
customer_reviews.text: perfect size to move several paper boxes at once. I like that this cart can be folded for storage.
customer_reviews.author: djz

customer_reviews.title: The best platform truck
customer_reviews.text: I have had many platform trucks and this is the best so far. We consider this the Mercedes of platform trucks and think it will last much longer than the others. If anything changes I will let you know.
customer_reviews.author: handyman

customer_reviews.title: Great cart
customer_reviews.text: The cart arrived faster than I thought, and it was a breeze to assemble; just put the wheels on and it was ready to go. The cart handles perfectly, and stores effortlessly. Thanks for having such a great product so far!! :)
customer_reviews.author: Georgette Robinson

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: The relatively low price had me concerned but this is a top quality product.
customer_reviews.author: Miev Y. Carhart

customer_reviews.title: excellent value
customer_reviews.text: Haven't used it yet but it is well built and sturdy. I can't wait to try it out.
customer_reviews.author: Patrick Shay

customer_reviews.title: Love this cart!!
customer_reviews.text: Awesome product!!! I manage a mattress store and there are times that I am the only person working. Some of our mattress come rolled up and are very awkward and heavy. I no longer need to ask the customers to help me load their merchandise 😊 This cart has been a wonderful edition to our team!!
customer_reviews.author: Tkgg

customer_reviews.title: Great
customer_reviews.text: Worked great. Handled the load and was easy to use.
customer_reviews.author: flstiver@aol.com

customer_reviews.title: Very handy
customer_reviews.text: Very handy I use for house holding and move stuff around
customer_reviews.author: RK

customer_reviews.title: It rolls so easy with a load on it
customer_reviews.text: I order the Adir Office folding aluminum platform for transporting catering equipment out of the trailer into the event building. I was looking for something that was rust proof and very durable. Will buddy this platform is heavy duty. It rolls so easy with a load on it. I will be ordering 2 more. Very pleased with this order can not say enough,
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Solid product - great value - a small suggestion
customer_reviews.text: This product is a great value and is sturdy and well built. Perfect for my needs. One suggestion - include some instructions (or maybe mine was lost?) It is pretty basic, but there are two fixed wheels and 2 swivel wheels - some people may not know where to put each wheel (swivel goes closed to push bar).
customer_reviews.author: Creighton A. Mantey Jr.

customer_reviews.title: Great product
customer_reviews.text: Bought this for moving my products for bazaars. We love it. Even use it to bring in groceries!
customer_reviews.author: Denise

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Good cart, well made and large for the money. Recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great price!
customer_reviews.text: Product is well built for the price. Wheels are nice and heavy. My only problem is the shipping box. Cheap cardboard and no foam. Box was delivered full of holes and dents in the cart.
customer_reviews.author: Zach

customer_reviews.title: So easy to move around!
customer_reviews.text: This cart is exactly what I was looking for. So easy to use and extremely sturdy! I was looking for something to move multiple bag of bark around in my yard, cases of water and other heavy items. This is absolutely perfect. I am going to purchase another one for my son soon.
customer_reviews.author: Catherine P.

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Pretty lightweight, it can handle a fairly good-sized load. Hope it lasts!
customer_reviews.author: SEVideo

customer_reviews.title: Excellent Cart
customer_reviews.text: Love this cart. Perfect for transporting our boxes and stuff when moving. Only issue we faced is it can be a little difficult to maneuver sometimes and wish there were locks on the wheels but the carts still work well.
customer_reviews.author: Jenna Dingee

customer_reviews.title: Quality product
customer_reviews.text: Quality product, well made, arrived on time. Box damaged, but no impact on the item. Was pleasantly surprised at how easily cart moved across grass and gravel (though admitedly not fully loaded at the time).
customer_reviews.author: Justice

customer_reviews.title: Good truck cart
customer_reviews.text: Time will tell as to the quality and how long it will last but so far so good.
customer_reviews.author: CM

customer_reviews.title: DONT OVERLOOK THIS ONE!!!!!
customer_reviews.text: I Am a Very Petite Women . Under 5 Feet . THIS CART TURNS ON A DIME . FURTHER IT IS ABSOLUTLEY LIGHTER THAN EXPECTED BUT IT HAUAL VERY HEAVY LOADS . HIGHLY RECOMMEND
customer_reviews.author: sharon l mclenon

customer_reviews.title: Solid and handles well.
customer_reviews.text: Good product. You should include a small wrench to ease installatioon of wheels.
customer_reviews.author: John McFadden

customer_reviews.title: Good could be better
customer_reviews.text: Do unit came with no instructions, I had to replace six of the 12 bolts that stripped out on me. Box came damaged with a small ding in the front of the unit. I needed the product and had made do with the issues
customer_reviews.author: Kirk C Najarian

customer_reviews.title: Great at handling weight
customer_reviews.text: I use this to move produce from truck to stall at farmers market. It handles the fruit boxes with no problem. Easy to flip up handle and fold when in transport.
customer_reviews.author: Katherine R.

customer_reviews.title: Great Product
customer_reviews.text: Works great .. I was worried the collapsible handle wouldn’t be sturdy but it’s been perfect.
customer_reviews.author: Shaun G

customer_reviews.title: Great product
customer_reviews.text: Great size I can put 6 cases of water bottles on it with no problems and other stuff on top didn't break under the weight, very well made to.
customer_reviews.author: DemonFarts

customer_reviews.title: Buying another soon!
customer_reviews.text: This product worked exactly as advertised. Delivery was prompt – set up was easy. We loaded it down and it works perfectly! Highly recommend. Going to order another one
customer_reviews.author: Julie Crofton

customer_reviews.title: Ok product
customer_reviews.text: Package arrived banged up. The cart itself had lots of dings and bumps on it. I believe that’s why it’s a bit hard to maneuver. Wouldn’t recommend!
customer_reviews.author: Stella

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Great cart! Heavy duty but light and easy to maneuver. We will be ordering more!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Light, easy and durable cart
customer_reviews.text: Fantastic tool for our staff. It is used to move product around with ease. All levels and types of employees enjoy the ease of use of this cart.
customer_reviews.author: Joe R.

customer_reviews.title: Foldable and easy to store.
customer_reviews.text: Cart works perfect for transporting five gallon buckets of soil in my laboratory. Well made.
customer_reviews.author: Trenton Titchenal

customer_reviews.title: Quality Product
customer_reviews.text: I haven't really used it yet but it seems to be well made; I expect it to meet my needs.
customer_reviews.author: Donald E. Hyson

customer_reviews.title: Quite sturdy, easy to handle
customer_reviews.text: Quite sturdy, easy to handle, holds loads well. Wheels seem to be sturdy at this point. Light enough to fold and load into vehicle along with other equipment.
customer_reviews.author: Martin W.

customer_reviews.title: Great Cart!
customer_reviews.text: This cart is great! It rides super smooth and is very quiet. We use it in a condominium setting so issues like noise generated are important to us. It's sturdy and built well and handles all our needs.
customer_reviews.author: Twelve Twelve

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: Very sturdy and turns corners well. I wish it was not so heavy though.

customer_reviews.title: That it is easy to use
customer_reviews.text: I will be using this item to transfer furniture, I really like it, thanks for asking.
customer_reviews.author: Marva Rivers

customer_reviews.title: Better than expected
customer_reviews.text: The cart is rugged but very light weight, exactly what we needed and were looking for!
customer_reviews.author: rbecksted

customer_reviews.title: Good'n
customer_reviews.text: Solid product; oerload it regularly and it keeps doin its job.
customer_reviews.author: Ria Dumlao

customer_reviews.title: Great product
customer_reviews.text: Very sturdy and well made, gets the job done, happy with the purchase

customer_reviews.title: handle , seems a little slight for the weight the cart will carry .
customer_reviews.text: handle , seems a little slight for the weight the cart will carry .

customer_reviews.title: Very Sturdy!
customer_reviews.text: This cart is super sturdy, moves smoothly, and is easy-to-maneuver.

customer_reviews.title: This product performed as advertised and worked great! Loaded six boxes and a table onto it ...
customer_reviews.text: This product performed as advertised and worked great! Loaded six boxes and a table onto it and moved it several blocks in the city. No problems.
customer_reviews.author: Rdalot17

customer_reviews.title: Dents very easily and would no way hold the 660 lbs it ...
customer_reviews.text: Cart is flimsy. Dents very easily and would no way hold the 660 lbs it claims to cover. After about 200 it is struggling.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: The construction is great, very solid and well made
customer_reviews.text: Used this cart a couple times and it worked well. The construction is great, very solid and well made. Would recommend this to anyone.
customer_reviews.author: Brad Curtis

customer_reviews.title: Great job by AdirOffice and great product
customer_reviews.text: Well packaged and arrived quickly. Great job by AdirOffice and great product!

customer_reviews.title: Good price, Good product
customer_reviews.text: I am really glad to have found this product. I really like it and it helps.

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Excellent value, smooth rolling, folds compactly, fairly light as the deck is primarily aluminum.

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Product was as advertised and works very well. Would definitely buy another one.

customer_reviews.title: so far so good. Setup is easy

customer_reviews.text: I attached a stadium seat to this, to make a racing vehicle for our office party. It held architects of all sizes, who could stretch legs out on it. Perfect size for a race.

customer_reviews.text: Excellent product! Glad I spent the extra few dollars to get this over the others.

product_meta.title: AdirOffice Folding Aluminum Platform Truck - Flatbed Cart - Single Handle - 5" Non-Marking Polyurethane Casters - 600 lbs Capacity - 48'' x 24''
product_meta.description: Ideal in industrial and commercial settings, the AdirOffice Folding Aluminum Platform Truck can be used for transporting heavy loads up to a 600-lb. capacity . As such, this handy tool is perfect for any application that requires heavy lifting time and time again. The platform is expertly constructed of durable aluminum to provide long-term strength and use throughout the years. For increased durability, the deck is corrosion-resistant , permitting use in any type of weather or environment without the material breaking down. Even though the AdirOffice is extremely durable, it only weighs a mere 28 lb. for easy transport. Combined with its lightweight , the cart maneuvers easily and quietly on two swivel and two, rigid 5" rubber casters . Integral vinyl deck bumpers on each corner will protect your cargo from damage, as well as doorways and walls from getting scratched or scuffed. Measuring 48" in length and 24" in width, this perfectly sized dolly can navigate through narrow corridors perfectly and smoothly every time. It s made with a comfortable, ergonomically designed handle which can be folded down for compact storage, and features a ribbed surface to help retain cargo and keep other packages intact. The folding platform truck will protect workers from injuries while maximizing productivity and improving efficiency in any environment . Offering a great solution in warehouses, receiving docks, manufacturing plants and distribution facilities, the AdirPro will surely save time and money for many years to come .
feature_bullets: QUALITY CONSTRUCTION. Made using high-quality tempered glass fitted in a durable aluminum frame to provide long-term strength, you can proudly display this sign in your place of business for years to come.

ATTRACTIVE OPEN SIGN. Outshine your competitors with an Open Sign to improve visibility. Furnished with bright, safe, and energy-efficient LED lights in red and blue, this black sign will definitely give your business a boost.

DISPLAY MODES. Attract customers from a distance with this noticeable, LED Open Sign. Offering a daily invigorating sight, this sign can be displayed in a flashing or steady light mode to notify customers that your business is open.

CHOICE OF SHAPE AND SIZE. For convenience, the Alpine Industries is available in multiple sizes and shapes. Choose among a 19" x 10" rectangle sign in a horizontal or vertical orientation, as well as a 19" x 10" or a 23" x 14" oval to meet your needs.

EASY TO USE. Equipped with a hanging chain and a plug-in cord, you’ll be open for business in no time at all. Simply hang the chain up and plug it in, then power it on using the switch on the cord and select your desired mode with the switch on the sign.
